ClassDesc: Checked exception thrown when a file system operation is denied, typically due to a file permission or other access check. This exception is not related to the @B_java#security#AccessControlException_E@ or @B_java#lang#SecurityException_E@ thrown by access controllers or security managers when access to a file is denied.
